attributes.action: STOP Phone Companies selling our details (Name & Telephone Number) for  Unsolicited Nuisance Sales Calls
attributes.additional_details: Do you think it is right for Companies to sell our details to Marketing Companies only for us to get unwanted NUISANCE calls from Companies, where you have not given your details to, ie;  PPI, Insurances, Debts & Will services, the list goes on. Tenants and Homeowners are fed up to the back teeth of these Companies bombarding your home with calls at least 5-10 times a day, it is very distressing for a lot of people especially for the  vunerable and the elderly, It is annoying and can be despressing which  should not be allowed in this day and age. We have loads of technology if people want to enquire about these services. We need to STOP them NOW.
